name: Chrome Blank New Tab
description: Blanks the new tab page in Chrome. Requires a redirect extension in Chrome 61+
obsoletion_message: Stylish can no longer affect chrome's new tab page. Use this extension instead: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/blank-new-tab-page/jaadjnlkjnhohljficgoddcjmndjfdmi
additional_info: [NOTE]: For newer versions of chrome, it may be necessary to use (this extension) and redirect to this url: https://www.google.com/_/chrome/newtab [OLD NOTE]: If effect does not apply, edit the Local State file in %LOCALAPPDATA%\Google\Chrome\User Data and change the "nntp" value from true to false. (Similar extension)
